fi.tamk.yourtrueself.screens

Class MainScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.tamk.yourtrueself.screens.MainScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, AchievementListener

    public class MainScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen, AchievementListener
    Main screen of the game. Player spends almost all of their time here.
